issue.title: Block new PopAds variant by regex

comment.body: @AdamWr Yeah, I thought about that and may eventually change to that, but so far there seem to be some fixed patterns of the order they align. I thought `(?:(?:js|css|images|static|common|assets|scripts|api)\/)*` might be too generic as it can match whatever orders and numbers of them, probably my overthinking though.
